name: Dawn Of The Director - Demo
description:
Dawn of the Director is a mischievous strategy game where the Player (“The Director”, a filmmaker gone rogue) stages hoax horror films under the guise of an appealing Vacation.

Build your set by constructing the perfect vacation getaway. Stage the scene with cameras and spooky contraptions. Create your own films (saved as GIFS) and watch your film studio grow in fame. Recreate your favorite horror flicks or compete with other film studios to dominate the film industry!

This is a limited demo to get feedback. 

This demo will only be available for a limited time. Many features are still in development and you most certainly will encounter bugs. If you give it a try, please submit any feedback in-game or here on itch.io. Many thanks!
